BIO

I am a dedicated professional driven by a fervent passion for fostering accessibility, web design, and education. Currently, my journey unfolds as a special designer, where I diligently work to ensure digital services are accessible to all. Prior to this, I immersed myself in the realm of educational technology as a digital learning specialist, where I cultivated a deep understanding of how technology intersects with learning. My passion lies also in education, as evidenced by my extensive tenure as a lecturer at the esteemed University of Applied Sciences.
